answers.answer: Awww hope u get better soon! Its very painful towards the end of pregnancy. Is this ur first baby?

I have to be induced next week as I have gestational diabetes (will be induced on my due date like I was with my little girl) And i'm really hoping I just go into labour naturally before then.. I have so many side effects and complications this pregnancy! I'm 39 w tomorrow.How far along are you?

question: I've been sick the past week and its not getting any better...I swear he's ruin out of room in my belly....doc said in 3 weeks they will take my stitch out if I make it that long lol
title: anyone else ready to not be pregnant anymore
